item.description:
Let's try Karaoke at a new venue in Lowell.

This is a non-exclusive event which means that we will be mixing in with the venue's regular patrons. The good news: No fee for attending. The bad news: longer waits for your turn at the microphone.

We can sit together as a group or we can mingle with everybody else.

Please visit the Duet topic in the Discussion page. If you have any interest in singing a duet, please add your favorite duet songs there.

Â
item.name: Lowell Karaoke
